message: anyone know how to have multiple Dropbox account installed on Windows, MAC and Ubuntu please? :D it just i use the 3 operating systems and i wish to have my dropbox accounts everywhere :(

data.message: Why having multiple accounts? You can use the same account everywhere like I do I work on Mac & own a PC. Using only one Dropbox account on both.

- you can find how to run dropbox.exe as a service
- add multiple windows accounts on ur machine
- u can run dropbox as a service multiple times with different windows account
